downloadTitle: How to download from DRACONIC games
downloadLine1: 1) Purchase the game from this website
downloadLine2: 2) Click the 'Install' button that apprears on the store page
downloadLine3: 3) Wait for the download to complete
downloadLine4: 4) Follow the on-screen wizard to complete the install
